CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Non-pecuniary damage - financial award;Costs and expenses (domestic proceedings) - claim dismissed;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and is currently residing in ORG . From DATE the applicant was employed as town clerk .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG informed the applicant that criminal proceedings had been instituted against him on charges of attempt to violate political rights of citizens and abuse of public authority .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant asked that a formal investigation be opened . On DATE ORG rejected this claim . The applicant appealed against this decision . On DATE the investigating judge decided that a formal investigation had to be opened .

CARDINAL . No activity was registered until DATE , when the applicant appeared on his own initiative before the investigating judge . On DATE a co - accused was examined and in DATE the investigating judge questioned QUANTITY witnesses during CARDINAL hearings .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG requested the investigating judge to charge the applicant with abuse of public authority . On DATE the investigating judge questioned the applicant and his co - accused . On CARDINAL DATE ORG requested the investigating judge to commit the applicant for trial .
CARDINAL . NORP In a decision of DATE , the investigating judge committed the applicant for trial before ORG . A hearing scheduled for DATE did not take place and the case was adjourned until DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the President of ORG summoned the applicant to appear on DATE .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE , filed with the registry on DATE , ORG relinquished jurisdiction in favour of ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant and his co - accused appealed on points of law against this judgment . By a decision of DATE , ORG declared the applicant ’s claim inadmissible .
CARDINAL . On DATE the president of ORG scheduled the date of the hearing for DATE .
CARDINAL . In a judgment of DATE , filed with the registry on DATE , ORG acquitted the applicant . This decision became final on DATE .
